blog_posts.title: AI Governing
blog_posts.description: AI Prompting --> AI Platform (AI Trining, AI Tuning) --> AI Governing. Before you implement your AI model into your business, Be Strategic about AI Platform, Data Management, and AI Governing

blog_posts.title: What IBM says about AI?
blog_posts.description: AI is going to touch every aspect of our lives

blog_posts.title: What is Neural Network?
blog_posts.description: How? our brains can effortlessly recognize alphabets/numbers, I tell you to write a program that takes a 28px X 28px grid with input 3 and predicts output single value 0-10, telling you what the digit is, Now learning the importance of Machine Learning, Neural Network (Input Layer, Hidden Layer, Output Layer)
